title: @Riot When are the super galaxy skins coming out?
body:
Its been what? 5 days?
I need super galaxy kindred {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't have any kind of release date for the skins as of yet >.<  The best advice I can give is to keep checking the store inside the client!  Once the skins are released, you should be able to see them on the front page ^.^

Can we get some kind of explanation for this? It seems like there has to be something going on with them, and since people are starting to get confused (I've been seeing questions like this all over), it seems like we deserve an explanation as to why the skins are so late in showing, and especially why you don't have a release date.

We purposefully don't give out a release date because we sometimes do encounter problems or bugs very late in the development right before we want to ship them to live.  Rather than dash people's hopes with a release date that we miss, we say during the patch to give us some wiggle room to polish them up as much as possible before releasing them!  We want them to make a great first impression after all ^.^
Thanks for the heads up! I was really disappointed when it didnt come out today but if it's for a good cause and purpose then i guess i shall wait as long as it takes for a worthwhile skin.
I hope the Skins will be released soon x~x
Seems like there's probably a bug with the skins.
Ehmm .. so this Skins will be released today?! Sry about my English... xD ¤~¤

Today would've been the best day for them to release it with skins sale after 7 days of patch update. Usually it takes 3 to 7 days because next week will be the end of patch 6.10 cycle and releaseing 3 new skins few days before next patch would be dumb. God knows why they are delaying it so much but maybe there is few bugs that they want to wait to fix it until next patch.
I mean they always say "During patch "."" the skins will be available" never the day the patch releases. Saying that i rly want my super galaxy fishy...
Same. I'm super stoked for the new {{champion:203}}  Skin. :D
I can't wait for the new super galaxy skins!
